metadata.title: AI Cruisers
metadata.author: R4V3-0N, Chrono Vortex, Altzeus, Pepson, and Alder
metadata.description:
THIS MOD HAS DEPENDENCIES! Make sure to patch "Vertex Tags and Utility Functions" first! (link below)
This mod adds a new race of hard-light AI Avatars from a distant, yet familiar universe. Content inspired by FTL: Captain's Edition and the Hyperspace Anthology, both by Sleeper Service.
This sample includes: - AI Cruiser type A, B, and C with achievements! Type A unlocked by default.
- 21 New Weapons - Effectors: Field displacers that infiltrate enemy systems and disrupt them with hacking. - Auto Laser: A high rate of fire laser equally effective at surpressing shields and disabling systems. - Auto Beam: A beam that vastly decreases its cooldown after firing just once, enabling rapid ship destruction. - Splitter Beams: A series of 'flak' beams that fire several pinpoint beams over a radius. - Ion Bust Beams: Beams which deal double damage to ionized rooms, but clear the ion effect. - Tech Minelaucher: Minelauncher that uses cloaking technology for greater destructive potential. - EMP Devices: A series of weapons that pops shields, slows shield regeneration, and inflicts ion on room hit. - Plasma Projectors: Pure incendiary weapons that can set ships ablaze. - Burst Scatter Lasers: A group of lasers that excel at dealing damage to the hull in exchange for unreliable system damage. - Melee: Fields and blades of hard light, constructed into... melee weapons!?
- 13 New Drones - Sentient AI Microfighters, a set of intelligent piloted drones that are specialised to form a variety of roles. - Interceptor Microfighter, a drone that is technically more sentient than you. An evasive drone that focuses fire on enemy defence drones before targeting the ship. - Shock Microfighter, piloted by an obnoxious avatar, this drone targets enemy systems with its light EMP device repeatedly while evading enemy fire. - Swarm Microfighter, the sword of a run away swarm-intelligence. Every alternating shot assimilates material to create a rudimentary attack drone. - Missile Combat Drones: Temporary drones that fires off a small series of missiles before despawning. - Focus Beam Defence Drone: a Defence drone that shoots down enemy projectiles with beams, never misses! - Combat Plasma Drone: A group of drones equipped with Plasma projectors. - Combat Scatter Laser Drone: A Combat drone equipped with a scatter laser. - Defense Scatter Laser Drone: A defensive model that fires a tight scatter of lasers at missiles.
- New Weapon Properties - X-Ray: Slowly erodes systems and rooms, eventually causing semi-permanent damage. - Cascade: Dealing damage to a room on fire causes chaos to erupt. - Containment: Reverse energy shielding! Trap enemy weapon fire within their own ship.
- New partial-unique sector with an original sound track made by Altzeus and a familiar track from a cluster far away. - 2 new hostile enemy ships and 2 accompanying Multiverse Renegades, and one new Multiverse Renegade Boss.
- New Race: AI Avatars, a synthetic race of disposable hardlight avatars with many immunities
- 7 New Augments - Hologram Emitter: Lets you produce a new AI Avatar when one perishes at empty beacons. - Anti-Gravity Engine: The more punishment your Shields take, the higher your evasion grows! - Sentient Combat AI: Increasing the effects of manning a system. - Conductive Hull Plating: Allows your ship to create ion storms inside nebulas, and regain lost reactor power in an ion storm. - Assimilative Drone Bays: Constructs a temporary drone equipped with a Pinpoint when destroying an enemy drone, or sometimes when taking damage. - Rerouted Insulation: Gives the ship an 80% ion resistance, but renders all crew onboard more susceptible to stun. - Reflective Armour Plating: Significant resistance to beam weapons. ...and More!
Special thanks to Julk, Lizzard, and Vertaalfout for providing additional assistance.
Download Vertex: https://github.com/ChronoVortex/FTL-HS-Vertex/releases/latest
